A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This ambitious title tries to reinvent the Star Wars genre and fails. As a generic movie\, it's not awful. But as a Star Wars movie\, it's not good. there are many character changes in this film\, specifically Luke Skywalker that is present and ruins his character while making him unlikabke. Along with that\, the rules of space are defied as there is now apparently gravity In space as seen in the opening scene of the film. Overall\, it didn't feel like a Star Wars movie and seemed to fail on all of the exciting parts that were left open in the last movie. Disappointing
